page.title: 14LEISURE CENTRE,SWADLINCOTE.
page.content: { Jackie Charlton}( footballer) opened the centre in{March 1978.}300 people work there including cleaners, instructors, management, receptionists & assistants. The centre has had 7 famous visitors: Geoff Capes, Big Daddy, Giant Haystacks, Princess Alice, David Wilkie & Jackie Charlton. The most popular club is{judo}there are other clubs such as{swimming,} {tennis, badminton, squash}& lots more. The building is filled by{2 {swimming pools,}1 main pool & a learners pool. The leisure centre has {2 multi - purpose sports halls,}the main hall & the Grove halls. The main hall also includes badminton, football, 5-a-side football, volly ball, table tennis, netball, roller skating, karate & LOTS LOTS MORE.
